comment: Marines with st Battalion , rd Marine Regiment take part in a company sized assault during Lava <URL>
amr:

(p / participate-01
      :ARG0 (p2 / person
            :ARG0-of (h / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (m / military
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Marine"
                              :op2 "Battalion")))
            :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                  :ARG1 (m2 / military
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "Rd"
                              :op2 "Marine"
                              :op3 "Regiment"))))
      :ARG1 (a / assault-01
            :ARG0 p2
            :ARG1-of (s / size-01
                  :ARG2 (c / company)))
      :time (c2 / city
            :name (n3 / name
                  :op1 "Lava")))

comment: is it still the marines if you get stationed in paradise ? Weather : degrees and sunny . Uniform : tank top and speedo . Mission : fun
amr:
# ::snt is it still the marines if you get stationed in paradise ? Weather : degrees and sunny . Uniform : tank top and speedo . Mission : fun
(m / multi-sentence
      :snt1 (h / have-condition-91
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h2 / have-org-role-91
                        :ARG1 (m2 / military
                              :name (n / name
                                    :op1 "Marines")))
                  :domain (y / you)
                  :mod (s / still))
            :ARG2 (s2 / station-01
                  :ARG1 y
                  :ARG2 (p2 / paradise))
            :polarity (a / amr-unknown))
      :snt2 (a2 / and
            :op1 (w / weather
                  :mod (d / degree)
                  :mod (s3 / sunny))
            :op2 (u / uniform)
            :op3 (t / top
                  :mod (t2 / tank))
            :op4 (s4 / speedo))
      :snt3 (f / fun-01
            :ARG1 (m3 / mission-01)))

comment: I grew up just off the base in Kailua when my dad was stationed at CINCPAC fleet on the other side of the island
amr:

(g / grow-up-04
      :ARG1 (ii / i)
      :location (o / off
            :op1 (b / base
                  :location (c / city
                        :name (n / name
                              :op1 "Kailua")))
            :mod (j / just))
      :time (s / station-01
            :ARG1 (p / person
                  :ARG0-of (h / have-rel-role-91
                        :ARG1 ii
                        :ARG2 (d / dad)))
            :ARG2 (f / fleet
                  :mod (o2 / organization
                        :name (n2 / name
                              :op1 "CINCPAC"))
                  :location (s2 / side
                        :mod (o3 / other)
                        :part-of (ii2 / island)))))
